channel.title: Building UHI EUA App on ABDM Sandbox Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Building UHI EUA App on ABDM Sandbox Documentation

item.title: Sign In/Up with PHR Addr
item.description: Sign in with ABHA Number/Mobile Number Overview of the functionality User can login with mobile number/email ID linked to their ABHA ID/address OTP is sent to the userâ€™s mobile number/email ID to authenticate the request User enters the OTP to authenticate the request. In case multiple ABHA numbers are linked to their number they can choose the account they want to login with. The user is displayed the linked ABHA addresses to their ABHA ID and proceeds to select one to login.

item.title: Teleconsultations
item.description: - Teleconsultations - Search HSPAs for Doctor - Display search results - Book selected Doctor/Facility - Collect Payment if required - Confirm Booking - Exchange Messages with Doctor - Share health records - Setup WebRTC (teleconsults) - Initiate Call (teleconsults) - Get final prescription
